div.bibl: Interview, with Mr. Edward B. Myddleton (retired), 5669 Washington Boulevard, Chicago, Illinois, by Stephen O. Davies. AUTOBIOGRPHY OF MR. EDWARD B. MYDDLETON

body.p: Born 1863 at Rhyl, North Wales. Graduate of grammar school, one year of private school. Came to Chicago in 1885; naturalized in 1887. Married and has two daughters. Was superintendent for Lennox and Alderman, Contractors, from 1885 to 1889. Was in partnership as Myddleton Roberts, 1889 to 1894.

From 1894 to 1903 was superintendent for Lennox-Alderman. During 1903 was superintendent for Smith-Eastman Contractors on St. Louis Worldâ€™s Fair Buildings. Went into the contracting business as Myddleton and Company in 1904 and has been operating as such since.
Clubs: Medinah Country; Lake Shore Club; Glenn Oak Golf Club.
Home: 5669 Washington Boulevard, Chicago, Illinois. Phone: Mansfield 2440.
